title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Missed out on GROK? Here is your chance to buy GROQ! The better AI version of GROK. Groq inc was founded in 2016 way before grok was released !Groq and xAI are in different, but related businesses. Groq is making the chips that make it possible for any generative AI model to be insanely fast (their demo is on Llama 2), but they’re both in the AI business.Community run project0/0 TAX BURNT RENOUNCEDFeatures:User LLM-Base : Brought to you by the mibds who pushed the most innovative programming language in the world.Chip Design: Developed in house CPU chips that has proprietary technologyTalk to any LLM across chains.Build no-code websites by giving clear text values.Speak to audience / followers without using social media.✔️Up over 1000% in first 24 hours!✔️LP locked✔️recent news: https://www.techdirt.com/2023/11/15/does-elon-grok-the-trademark-issues-with-grok-ai-chip-company-groq-does/TELEGRAM TWITTER WEBSITEYOUTUBECHART

comments.author: Ms_Mining
comments.body: Quote from: robymezzz on November 28, 2023, 12:46:46 AMExcellent contribution, GROQ is an amazing tool for AI and extremely fast to use. Eager to see its progress in the future.Did you register specifically for this message of praise? Although no, the author of the topic is known for using bots to generate praising messages for his shitty topics.@miningrelease
